alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:39PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Santa Cruz County through 430 PM MST... At 339 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Patagonia, or 18 miles northeast of Nogales, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tubac, Rio Rico, Patagonia, Nogales International Airport, Patagonia Lake State Park, Tumacacori and Amado. This includes the following highways... Interstate 19 between mile markers 7 and 25. Route 82 between mile markers 9 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
